<title level="1" pfs="">[Jubilost Narthropple (Level 1)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2393)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 25

**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Jubilost Narthropple (Level 1)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2393)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 33</row>

**Perception** +4; (expert) [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +7, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +7, [First World Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +7, [Forest Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +7, [Hill Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +4, [River Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +7, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Infused Items** Jubilost generally carries the following infused items (leaving infused reagents handy for Quick Alchemy), which last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: lesser [alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) (4), and minor [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) (2).

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [crossbow with 10 bolts](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67), [Alchemist's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), [Backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4), bandolier, [Bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), belt pouch, [Chalk](/Equipment.aspx?ID=12) (10), [Explorer's Clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2), formula book, [hooded lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=29), [Padded Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3), [pint of oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=38) (2), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), sheath, [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62), [writing set with extra ink and paper](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63), 4 gp, and 2 sp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 18

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4–1 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lesser alchemist's fire +5 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d8 fire plus 1 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and 1 fire splash damage

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +5 ([range 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 16
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169)

**[Alchemy](/Classes.aspx?ID=1)**   

**Formula Book**   Jubilost's formula book contains the formulas for lesser [acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), lesser alchemist's fire, lesser [antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80), lesser [bottled lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), minor [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), lesser [feyfoul](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1757), lesser [tanglefoot bag](/Equipment.aspx?ID=78), and [sunrod](/Equipment.aspx?ID=137).

**[Quick Alchemy](/Actions.aspx?ID=2)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) 

**Research Field**   [Bomber](/ResearchFields.aspx?ID=1)

**Ancestry Feats**   [Fey Fellowship](/Feats.aspx?ID=27)

**Class Feats**   [Far Lobber](/Feats.aspx?ID=94)

**Skill Feats**   [Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=752), [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) (Nature)

**Class Abilities**   Alchemy, Formula Book, [Research Field](/classes/alchemist/research-fields)

</column>
name: Jubilost Narthropple (Level 1)
